A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I different take on Star Wars and how the story develops. A very spiritual and thought provoking movie which it shows that the teacher isn't always all knowing. Characters are complex and they show their human side with their flaws.\n\nThe director took a risk to follow a different path to what the fanboys were expecting and in my opinion it's paid off. I don't want to see a remake of the empire strikes back but sadly that's what people wanted to see. The same old story only in a different shell. For this movie I side with the critics.
